title: German mother and daughter found living at Larnaca Airport in Cyprus for more than a year - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
German mother and daughter found living at Larnaca Airport in Cyprus for more than a year Published on : Wednesday, September 23, 2015
Very similar to the plot of The Terminal, a popular Tom Hanks movie, the Larnaca Airport in Cyprus is the present address of a German mother and daughter since August 2014. The women are reportedly living in the airport car park and are very little keen to bring a change in their circumstances.
According to the reports on local newspapers, the mother and daughter arrived from Israel after their visa expired and they continued living in the airport since then. The airport authority, police and even the German Embassy offered help to the ladies; however, they refused all of them.
According to the staff at the Larnaca Airport, the ladies regularly use the washrooms of the airport along with the other facilities like Wi-Fi, restaurants and shopping areas.
The mysterious pair according to the local newspaper Aspris, arrived on August 12, 2014. As per the European decree any citizen from the European Union cannot be expelled from a country if they have not committed a crime and thus, the pair continues to stay.
For more updates on the story, stay tunedâ€¦
